Name: Chinese Chess/ Elephant Game: 象棋/ 中国象棋/ 中國象棋
About the game: Please make sure your computer supports unicode. This Is A Chinese Chess Game. To win the game, you need to kill the enemy's general, that is , to achieve 'Checkmate'. The current game version contain the following features: Basic scene with Chessboard, pieces, and some furniture~ The 'Artificial Idiot' support on single player so that you can play with computer AI. Steam achievements system... With Steam Workshop, you can create and upload your own AI design and scenes. Multiplayer through internet (because there aren't many players, you may need a friend to start a match) Contact via QQ QQ group：678755273
